channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: U&i
channel.desc: This show for kids promotes a greater understanding for people with difficulties and helps develop empathy. With the help of two fairies, the main character thinks about what can be done to help.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japanology Plus Mini
channel.desc: For hundreds of years, Japanese people have used name stamps, known as hanko, to sign their name. In a 5-minute digest, we discover their history and explore what a hanko-free future might look like.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Spiritual Explorers
channel.desc: Japan lies in a volcanic zone and boasts over 3000 onsen. We visit two old hot springs to learn the significance of bathing to the Japanese spirit.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Bosai: Science That Can Save Your Life
channel.desc: In 2021, digital twin technology analyzed a landslide in Atami and prevented further disasters. Find out how it is also used for tsunami prediction.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Masterpieces Of Historic Capitals
channel.desc: Historic capitals in the Kansai region are home to a wealth of national treasures and masterpieces. In Nara, we delve into astonishing Buddhist and Shinto art.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: When My Coffee Reaches Someone
channel.desc: A small cafe in the city of Kumamoto. From across Japan, people dealing with the death of a loved one are drawn to this special spot. A story of loss and renewal that begins with a cup of coffee.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Darwin's Amazing Animals
channel.desc: The Tama River runs through Tokyo. It's home to Ayu, the queen of freshwater streams. Every year 10 million of them go upstream to spawn. But many invasive species are intruding on their oasis now.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: U&i
channel.desc: This show for kids promotes a greater understanding for people with difficulties and helps develop empathy. With the help of two fairies, the main character thinks about what can be done to help.

channel.title: Japanology Plus Mini

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Time And Tide
channel.desc: This episode features the aquatic Namikozo, which warns locals in the area of the Enshu-nada Sea of coming changes in the weather by beating its drum to give waves a distinct, rumbling tone.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Core Kyoto Mini
channel.desc: The head Inari shrine has 30,000 subordinate shrines throughout Japan. Since its foundation in 711, the Inari deities attract worshippers with varying needs.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Cinematic Journey
channel.desc: Join our explorers as they pursue the cinematic beauty of Japan. Kyle Card hikes the newly designated long trail around majestic Mt. Fuji and discovers its secrets.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Little Charo
channel.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home. Season 1-6.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: A Cat's Eye View Of Japan
channel.desc: In the Western-influenced port town of Kobe, a kitty seeks attention while its owner makes shoes at a custom shop. You'll meet a popular shopping district kitty that has its own designer T-shirt.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Cycle Around Japan Highlights
channel.desc: This ride through Nara, site of Japan's ancient capital, takes us through historic locations bright with the colors of fall, a tranquil countryside brimming with the wisdom of the old days.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Mitateru Phose: Let's Change Perspectives!
channel.desc: This program employs "mitateru," a Japanese technique, to inspire children's imagination by encouraging them to view objects differently and develop their unique perspectives and creativity.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Somewhere Street
channel.desc: Florence is a city in Italy that is celebrated for its medieval history. Renowned as the birthplace of the Renaissance, from the 14th to 16th centuries, Florence was a cultural and artistic capital.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Ramen Japan
channel.desc: This time in Wakayama, heartland of shoyu, we find a distinctive ramen culture pairing ramen and...sushi?

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Easy Japanese For Work
channel.desc: Accelerate your Japanese language skills! Learn practical, effective workplace expressions, understand business culture and improve your kanji.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: The World Heritage Sites In Japan
channel.desc: Mt. Fuji is Japan's tallest and most famous peak. It has long inspired awe and terror, and is a source of artistic inspiration. Join us to explore the iconic beauty of this famous mountain.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Grand Sumo Highlights
channel.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from May 11th, Day 1 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Tokyo.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Core Kyoto Mini
channel.desc: Kyoto has many stores specializing in traditional snacks and treats, called Oyatsu. Some purveyors continue to use age-old ingredients and methods.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Zero Waste Life
channel.desc: Maro Kuratani knits scarves and other items with surplus yarn, using threads of varying color and thickness. She says yarn is the ultimate eco-friendly material as reknitting is always an option.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Innovative Investigations
channel.desc: The sale of sexual videos and photographs of minors is a lucrative international industry. Part two of our series examines this burgeoning trade and what can be done to stop it.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Grand Sumo Legends
channel.desc: Kitanoumi became the youngest ever yokozuna in 1974 and went on to dominate the ring for a decade. We revisit his career through NHK archive footage and newly recorded interviews.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Cycle Around Japan Highlights
channel.desc: This ride through Nara, site of Japan's ancient capital, takes us through historic locations bright with the colors of fall, a tranquil countryside brimming with the wisdom of the old days.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Mitateru Phose: Let's Change Perspectives!
channel.desc: This program employs "mitateru," a Japanese technique, to inspire children's imagination by encouraging them to view objects differently and develop their unique perspectives and creativity.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: J Melo
channel.desc: Join May J. for great Japanese music! Three former members of the pioneering J-fusion band CASIOPEA now play as the KATSUSHIKA TRIO. This week, they're in the J-MELO studio to chat and perform.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japanology Plus Mini
channel.desc: Goldfish in Japan range from beautiful to comical. A single ranchu - known as the "king of goldfish" - can cost millions of yen. In a 5-minute digest, we explore why they are so beloved.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: Sekiguchi Itaru helped to restore the pipe organ at Notre Dame in Paris, following the cathedral's fire in 2019. He tells us about his work, including the tuning and voicing of these instruments.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline

channel.title: Bosai: Science That Can Save Your Life
channel.desc: In 2021, digital twin technology analyzed a landslide in Atami and prevented further disasters. Find out how it is also used for tsunami prediction.

channel.title: Culture Crossroads
channel.desc: As a series in Culture Crossroads, BOSAI Be Prepared provides practical knowledge to save life from natural disaster. Today, we learn what happens when a volcano erupts and how we should be prepared.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Time Lapse Journey
channel.desc: The Amakusa region has over 120 islands and is home to one of the places where a unique form of Christianity developed. See Amakusa's historic sights and natural beauty through time-lapse photography.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Sumopedia
channel.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Darwin's Amazing Animals
channel.desc: The Tama River runs through Tokyo. It's home to Ayu, the queen of freshwater streams. Every year 10 million of them go upstream to spawn. But many invasive species are intruding on their oasis now.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk News 7
channel.desc: News 7 is NHK's flagship domestic evening news program, bringing you the latest from our Tokyo studio. It's presented with English audio on NHK World for our international viewers.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Newsroom Tokyo
channel.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Herbal Symphony
channel.desc: In Uda, discover Japan's oldest private medicinal herb garden, where the natural landscape from 300 years ago is preserved in a botanical time capsule, a sanctuary of the local culture and history.

channel.title: Sumopedia
channel.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Activate Your Japanese!
channel.desc: Learn how to make the most of your Japanese skills. Watch our drama that features useful communication strategies, our snappy videos about onomatopoeia, and our documentaries on "senpai" in Japan.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Hello! Nhk World Japan
channel.desc: We intorduce the contents and activities of NHK WORLD-JAPAN to make the station and programs known to more people all over the world. This is the window of the station to the world.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: Chef Sasaki Yotaro is known for his unique fermented dishes and doburoku, an unfiltered sake he brews from rice he grows himself. He talks about the craft that goes into creating world-class cuisine.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Treasure Box Japan
channel.desc: Dotonbori, the heart of Osaka's food scene, strives to remain beloved through efforts by its shopping district that include a vegan-friendly cafe, tackling waste issues, and supporting at-risk youth.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Seasoning The Seasons
channel.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history. Today, The Iseji Route: Journey of the Soul over Passes.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Medical Frontiers
channel.desc: Ultrasound is emerging as an effective treatment for pancreatic cancer. HIFU uses focused heat to target and destroy cancer cells, and there is minimal harm to the body. We report on its potential.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Where We Call Home
channel.desc: On this episode, we meet American Jerry Martin, an author of children's books based in Saitama, and Daniel Muivakitonyi from Kenya, a running instructor in Tokyo.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Activate Your Japanese!
channel.desc: Learn how to make the most of your Japanese skills. Watch our drama that features useful communication strategies, our snappy videos about onomatopoeia, and our documentaries on "senpai" in Japan.

channel.title: Hello! Nhk World Japan
channel.desc: We intorduce the contents and activities of NHK WORLD-JAPAN to make the station and programs known to more people all over the world. This is the window of the station to the world.

channel.title: Journeys In Japan

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Dining With The Chef
channel.desc: Let's cook Chef Rika's vinegar dishes! Featured recipes: (1) Tangy Egg Drop Soup with Spinach and Tomatoes (2) Grilled Asparagus with Sesame Vinaigrette Dressing (3) Chicken Glazed with Vinegar Sauce.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Document 72 Hours
channel.desc: A 24-hour supermarket in Osaka is known for its brightly colored exterior and very cheap bento meals and prepared foods. For three days, we talked to people filling their shopping baskets here.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Sumopedia
channel.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Dining With The Chef
channel.desc: Let's cook Chef Rika's vinegar dishes! Featured recipes: (1) Tangy Egg Drop Soup with Spinach and Tomatoes (2) Grilled Asparagus with Sesame Vinaigrette Dressing (3) Chicken Glazed with Vinegar Sauce.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: At the 65th Annual Grammy Awards, Masa Takumi won Best Global Music Album. This was the culmination of a life goal that Takumi moved across the world to Los Angeles in order to achieve.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Treasure Box Japan
channel.desc: Famed for the speed and power of its float pulling, the Kishiwada Danjiri Festival is a dynamic spectacle. This episode highlights the two-day festival and the passion of those involved.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Document 72 Hours
channel.desc: A 24-hour supermarket in Osaka is known for its brightly colored exterior and very cheap bento meals and prepared foods. For three days, we talked to people filling their shopping baskets here.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Science View
channel.desc: Professor Takanori Takebe of Tokyo Medical and Dental University is breaking new ground with research on iPS cell-derived organoids. Discover how lives could be saved with Takebe's bold new ideas.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Journeys In Japan
channel.desc: Explore a different side of Japan. Meet the locals and discover traditions and cultures not usually found in guidebooks.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Dining With The Chef
channel.desc: Let's cook Chef Rika's vinegar dishes! Featured recipes: (1) Tangy Egg Drop Soup with Spinach and Tomatoes (2) Grilled Asparagus with Sesame Vinaigrette Dressing (3) Chicken Glazed with Vinegar Sauce.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Grand Sumo Highlights
channel.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from May 13th, Day 3 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Tokyo.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japan's Top Inventions
channel.desc: Discover the stories behind renowned Japanese products alongside our reporter. This time: Capsule Figures.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Frontrunners
channel.desc: Kitamura Asako is the first female floatmaker in the 300-year history of Aomori's Nebuta Matsuri, battling prejudice as she upholds this very male tradition while also imbuing a fresh new sensibility.

channel.title: Science View

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk News 7
channel.desc: News 7 is NHK's flagship domestic evening news program, bringing you the latest from our Tokyo studio. It's presented with English audio on NHK World for our international viewers.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Newsroom Tokyo
channel.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Herbal Symphony
channel.desc: In Uda, discover Japan's oldest private medicinal herb garden, where the natural landscape from 300 years ago is preserved in a botanical time capsule, a sanctuary of the local culture and history.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Newsroom Tokyo
channel.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japan's Top Inventions
channel.desc: Discover the stories behind renowned Japanese products alongside our reporter. This time: Capsule Figures.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Frontrunners
channel.desc: Kitamura Asako is the first female floatmaker in the 300-year history of Aomori's Nebuta Matsuri, battling prejudice as she upholds this very male tradition while also imbuing a fresh new sensibility.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Trails To Oishii Tokyo
channel.desc: Turnips are a versatile ingredient that spark the imagination of skilled chefs. Visit Japan's largest turnip production area and explore a variety of dishes, from Japanese to French cuisine.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Dive In Tokyo
channel.desc: We visit Mt. Mitake in western Tokyo, known for the Shinto shrine on its summit and sacred areas of virtually unspoiled nature. We learn about samurai devotees and the tradition of mountain worship.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Grand Sumo Highlights
channel.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from May 14th, Day 4 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Tokyo.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japan's Top Inventions
channel.desc: Discover the stories behind renowned Japanese products alongside our reporter. This time: Capsule Figures.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: Okumura Arisa created the Slow Order Cafe, a pop-up concept staffed entirely by people who stutter. She talks about her speech impediment and the vision behind her project.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Ukiyoe Edo Life: The Star Festival
channel.desc: For the annual Tanabata Star Festival, families across Edo flew bamboo stalks adorned with strips of paper and ornaments representing wishes. We examine what their wishes tell us about their lives.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Frontrunners
channel.desc: Kitamura Asako is the first female floatmaker in the 300-year history of Aomori's Nebuta Matsuri, battling prejudice as she upholds this very male tradition while also imbuing a fresh new sensibility.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Trails To Oishii Tokyo
channel.desc: Turnips are a versatile ingredient that spark the imagination of skilled chefs. Visit Japan's largest turnip production area and explore a variety of dishes, from Japanese to French cuisine.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Dive In Tokyo
channel.desc: We visit Mt. Mitake in western Tokyo, known for the Shinto shrine on its summit and sacred areas of virtually unspoiled nature. We learn about samurai devotees and the tradition of mountain worship.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: For over 20 years, Kuwayama Norihiko has been providing psychological care to children traumatized by war in places such as Palestine and the former Yugoslavia. He talks about being there for others.
